video.title: Torchwood
video.synopsis: This "Doctor Who" spinoff follows the fight against hostile aliens by the Torchwood Institute team, with the enigmatic Capt. Jack Harkness in command.

episodes.synopsis: When Constable Gwen Cooper witnesses the resurrection of a murder victim, it begins her journey into an underworld of monsters and alien hunters.
episodes.title: Everything Changes

episodes.synopsis: When a sex-addicted alien leaves a trail of gruesome deaths, Capt. Jack and Torchwood confront a violent new form of love in the 21st century.
episodes.title: Day One

episodes.synopsis: When Gwen retrieves an alien object from a fleeing petty thief, she's haunted by a vision of a lonely young boy.
episodes.title: Ghost Machine

episodes.synopsis: As a Japanese doctor attempts to rescue the soul of a half-Cybernised woman, a quiet day in Torchwood quickly becomes a living nightmare.
episodes.title: Cyberwoman

episodes.synopsis: Supernatural forces stalk the suburbs of Cardiff, but are they friendly or malevolent? And what do they want with the seemingly normal Pierce family?
episodes.title: Small Worlds

episodes.synopsis: Concerned that the space-time rift is spreading, Torchwood investigates a series of gruesome deaths in the village of Brynblaidd.
episodes.title: Countrycide

episodes.synopsis: Toshiko is given an alien pendant that enables her to hear other people's thoughts as the rest of the team puzzles over a centuries-old skeleton.
episodes.title: Greeks Bearing Gifts

episodes.synopsis: As Torchwood is linked to a series of brutal murders, it becomes clear that somebody wants their attention.
episodes.title: They Keep Killing Suzie

episodes.synopsis: When Eugene wakes to find himself dead and invisible to the rest of the world, only one person can discover the truth: Gwen Cooper.
episodes.title: Random Shoes

episodes.synopsis: When a plane from 1953 lands in present-day Cardiff, its three passengers are shocked to learn that they can never go back to their own time.
episodes.title: Out of Time

episodes.synopsis: Savage aliens are being kidnapped from the streets of Cardiff. Sent undercover to investigate, Owen soon befriends the charismatic Mark Lynch.
episodes.title: Combat

episodes.synopsis: Jack and Toshiko find themselves stranded in a packed dance hall in 1941, where they meet handsome American squad leader ... Capt. Jack Harkness.
episodes.title: Captain Jack Harkness

episodes.synopsis: The rift has been opened, time is splintering and the Torchwood team members face fragments of their pasts -- and terrifying visions of their futures.
episodes.title: End of Days

episodes.synopsis: As Capt. Jack returns, the Torchwood team reunites against Capt. John Hart, who wreaks havoc as he searches for something hidden on Earth.
episodes.title: Kiss Kiss, Bang Bang

episodes.synopsis: Torchwood suspects alien involvement when a burglary escalates into a citywide assault, and Jack realizes that the whole planet is in danger.
episodes.title: Sleeper

episodes.synopsis: Toshiko falls for a handsome soldier, trapped out of his time, who unwittingly holds the key to saving the world.
episodes.title: To the Last Man

episodes.synopsis: Rhys discovers the truth about Torchwood and becomes part of the team as they investigate a mysterious alien meat supply.
episodes.title: Meat

episodes.synopsis: An alien that can change memories infiltrates Torchwood. With Capt. Jack caught up in memories of his lost family, only Ianto's love can save him.
episodes.title: Adam

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Jack calls in Martha Jones to investigate a trail of mysterious deaths that leads to a sinister medical testing center.
episodes.title: Reset

episodes.synopsis: As Torchwood faces its darkest hour, Capt. Jack uses the resurrection glove, unleashing a primal force that wreaks havoc across Earth.
episodes.title: Dead Man Walking

episodes.synopsis: Owen's search for absolution may come from the lonely girl on the rooftop or a mission to find an alien device that's proving deadlier by the second.
episodes.title: A Day in the Death

episodes.synopsis: The night before her wedding, an alien shapeshifter leaves Gwen carrying more than she bargained for, and Jack must destroy her big day.
episodes.title: Something Borrowed

episodes.synopsis: When an old cinema reopens, past horrors -- caught between life and death -- emerge to stalk the streets of Cardiff.
episodes.title: From Out of the Rain

episodes.synopsis: Gwen discovers a darker side of Torchwood. Hundreds of people have disappeared without a trace, but why is Capt. Jack blocking attempts to find them?
episodes.title: Adrift

episodes.synopsis: A rigged building explodes, knocking the team unconscious. As their lives flash before their eyes, we learn how each was recruited to Torchwood.
episodes.title: Fragments

episodes.synopsis: Capt. John Hart returns for revenge on Torchwood, sending Capt. Jack back in time. Without their leader, Torchwood faces a city flooded with Weevils.
episodes.title: Exit Wounds

episodes.synopsis: An ordinary day becomes one of terror, as every child in the world stops and delivers a message to all the governments of Earth: "We are coming".
episodes.title: Children of Earth: Day One

episodes.synopsis: Members of the team are hunted down, Britain risks becoming a rogue state, and only one person holds the key to Torchwood's salvation.
episodes.title: Children of Earth: Day Two

episodes.synopsis: The eyes of the world turn to Britain, and members of Torchwood must battle to protect their own families as the fight gets personal.
episodes.title: Children of Earth: Day Three

episodes.synopsis: Torchwood finally learns the truth and everything now pivots around one man. Old allegiances are destroyed and true intentions are revealed.
episodes.title: Children of Earth: Day Four

episodes.synopsis: As violence erupts and anarchy reigns, an ordinary housing estate becomes a battleground where the future will be decided. Torchwood is defenseless.
episodes.title: Children of Earth: Day Five

episodes.synopsis: When everyone in the world stops dying, the CIA is alerted by a single word: Torchwood.
episodes.title: The New World

episodes.synopsis: Rex takes the Torchwood team back to the USA.
episodes.title: Rendition

episodes.synopsis: The new Torchwood team of Jack, Gwen, Rex and Esther swings into action.
episodes.title: Dead of Night

episodes.synopsis: The Torchwood team arrives in California, to plan a major raid on PhiCorp headquarters.
episodes.title: Escape to LA

episodes.synopsis: Vera travels to Los Angeles to join the Torchwood team.
episodes.title: The Categories of Life

episodes.synopsis: Captain Jack discovers that the conspiracy is more complicated than he ever imagined.
episodes.title: The Middle Men

episodes.synopsis: Gwen is faced with a terrible decision; she must choose between her family, and Jack.
episodes.title: Immortal Sins

episodes.synopsis: In a mansion in Montana, the Torchwood team makes an amazing discovery.
episodes.title: End of the Road

episodes.synopsis: The Torchwood team is splintered, defeated and scattered across the world.
episodes.title: The Gathering

episodes.synopsis: Torchwood take their places in a final attempt to find the mysterious blessing.
episodes.title: The Blood Line
